clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Kinesio Taping on Mutational Falsetto
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of Kinesio Taping on Mutational Falsetto: A Randomized, Double-blind, Sham-controlled Clinical Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Prof. Dr. Cemil Tascıoglu Education and Research Hospital Organization

clinical_study.source: Prof. Dr. Cemil Tascıoglu Education and Research Hospital Organization

brief_summary.textblock: This study aimed to assess of efficacy of the kinesio-taping on male patients suffering from mutational falsetto

detailed_description.textblock: Mutational falsetto is a functional voice disorder involving a failure to transition from the high-pitched voice of childhood to the lower-pitch ed voice of adolescence and adulthood. In the recent years, kinesio taping has begun to be employed for treating dysphonia patients. We hypothesized that, because the kinesio taping relaxes the suprahyoid muscles and pushes the larynx backward, it could also be used as a therapy of mutational falsetto. This study aimed to assess of efficacy of the kinesio taping on male patients suffering from mutational falsetto.

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of voice handicap index - 10
primary_outcome.description: It was assessed by voice handicap index - 10 that a self questionnaire in mutational falsetto patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 4 per question. The high scores were worst low scores were good.

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of voice handicap index - 10
primary_outcome.description: It was assessed by voice handicap index - 10 that a self questionnaire in mutational falsetto patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 4 per question. The high scores were worst low scores were good.

It was assessed by Grade-Roughness-Breathiness-Asthenia-Strain scale that a scale in mutational falsetto patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 3 per category. The high scores were worst low scores were good.

It was assessed by Grade-Roughness-Breathiness-Asthenia-Strain scale that a scale in mutational falsetto patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 3 per category. The high scores were worst low scores were good.

It was analyzed with noise harmonic ratio, jitter and shimmer that were calculated by computer software. Typical average values for the frequencies are 120 Hz for men and 210 Hz for women. The lower frequencies show masculine voice. The higher frequencies show feminine voices.

It was analyzed with noise harmonic ratio, jitter and shimmer that were calculated by computer software. Typical average values for the frequencies are 120 Hz for men and 210 Hz for women. The lower frequencies show masculine voice. The higher frequencies show feminine voices.

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of maximum phonation times
primary_outcome.description: The subjects tried to say the vowel "a'" for as long as they could than it was assessed as seconds. Typical average values for the maximum phonation times are between 15-30 seconds. The higher times show healthy phonation.

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of maximum phonation times
primary_outcome.description: The subjects tried to say the vowel "a'" for as long as they could than it was assessed as seconds. Typical average values for the maximum phonation times are between 15-30 seconds. The higher times show healthy phonation.

secondary_outcome.description: Age, gender, history of smoke, history of morbidities, history of treatments, diagnosis, were noted

arm_group.description: Evaluate of the Kinesio tex gold tape that applied to anterior neck localised.
Evaluate of the Kinesio tex gold tape that applied to different neck localised as no-stretched.

intervention.description: The Kinesio Tex Gold is a kinesio tape that had been certified and patented.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients suffered from Mutational falsetto
- Patients who were accept to consent form
- Patients who have not open wound on neck
Exclusion Criteria:
- Having mental disorders or major physiatric disorders
- Cognitive limitations
- Contact dermatitis
- history of smoking
- Asthma, chronic pulmonary diseases
- history of allergic reactions against to medical tape applied
- having an other organic vocal disorders
- advanced hearing loss
- Out of BMI<18.5 or 30<BMI
- Out of age 16-60 years old patients who were not accept to consent form.

eligibility.gender_description: The males show more commonly that findings of mutational falsetto.
